## Protocol.Debugger.EvaluateOnCallFrameRequest.silent property

In silent mode exceptions thrown during evaluation are not reported and do not pause execution. Overrides `setPauseOnException` state.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
silent?: boolean;
```
